actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB; Treasury Department; Interior Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 and the Fish and Wildlife Conservation Act of 1980 to establish the Nongame Fish and Wildlife Trust Fund, and to provide for voluntary contributions to such fund through a tax checkoff system, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code and the Fish and Wildlife Conservation Act of 1980 to establish the Nongame Fish and Wildlife Trust Fund. Provides for voluntary contributions of $1.00 or more to such Fund through a check-off system on a taxpayer's income tax return.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 and the Fish and Wildlife Conservation Act of 1980 to establish the Nongame Fish and Wildlife Trust Fund, and to provide for voluntary contributions to such fund through a tax checkoff system, and for other purposes.
